remarks: The inner product of a free module.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jun-2019.)
statement:

frlmipval $p |- ( ( ( I e. W /\ R e. X ) /\ ( F e. V /\ G e. V ) ) -> ( F ., G ) = ( R gsum ( F oF .x. G ) ) ) $.
